metadata.description: Personal plugin marketplace for Claude Code

plugins.name: travel-agent
plugins.description: Travel agents for flight research and trip tracking: Google Flights, ITA Matrix, Flighty, Tripsy

plugins.name: rename-agent
plugins.description: AI-powered file renaming using content analysis. Supports PDFs, images, and documents with pattern-based naming.

plugins.name: apple-pim
plugins.description: Native macOS integration for Calendar, Reminders, and Contacts using EventKit and Contacts frameworks

plugins.name: credit-card-benefits
plugins.description: Track and maximize premium credit card benefits with anniversary-aware checklists and YNAB integration

plugins.name: inbox-to-reminder
plugins.description: Scan email inbox for action items and create reminders in Apple Reminders

plugins.name: newsletter-unsubscriber
plugins.description: Scan inbox for newsletters and help unsubscribe from unwanted ones

plugins.name: inbox-to-parcel
plugins.description: Process shipping emails and add tracking to Parcel app
